entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Loche

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
